game_jam_2021.title: GMTK Game Jam 2021
game_jam_2021.lead: This year I participated in the GMTK game jam. This was the first jam I have ever been a part of and the first time I had really ever attempted to make a complete game. Considering I had only 48 hours, this was pretty ambitious for a first attempt, but I think the result was more than I could have hoped for.
